title: bans are to harsh
body: the banning system is way to harsh ... i had a bad game and sure ill admit i was some what toxic ... after the game ended 1 or 2 reported me and i got perma banned ... no warning ... no like temp ban ... nothing ... i wasent saying anything to bad ... mostly just calling my team shit witch i know isent nice but like its really not hard to ignore or turn off chat or soemthign block the person its not hard at all ... anyways a perma ban over somethign so small is WAY to much .... disable my chat .... give me a warning ... give me a temp ban ... do something other then instant perma ban right away

replies.body:
When you say just calling your team bad, that's not really accurate. 

In the 100+ lines of your chat I struggled to find anything that wasn't abuse.

Before the minions spawned you were already calling a team mate inappropriate names and encouraging them to commit self harm.

The rest of the game was a consistent tirade of abuse towards your team and the enemy team. 

If you want to post the chat log I can go through it with you to help you understand why, but it's not going to change the status of the ban.

"Riot needs a better, harsher punishment"

-gets ban-

"Rito pls too harsh"
I'd love to see the chat logs from that game. Rito, please?
